task.summary: Added possibility to add images to posts
* Adding image to post is optional * Added recommenders
Added link between recommenders and post
Added list view of post created by recommender
Fixed security for admin only post pages
Fixed security for admin only recommender pages
Posts are deletable - this also removes images and "cleans" tags - post is removed from tag if there are more post related to tag OR tag is removed if only 1 post is related to tag

Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/origin/UI-index' into add-recommenders
# Conflicts: # main/control/static_pages.py # main/static/dev/script/script.js # main/static/dev/style/style.css # main/static/src/style/style.less # main/templates/bit/header.html
Added option to star a review
You can only star when logged in
You can view your saved items

MESSAGE.value: Changed header and removed keywords
Added possiblitity to add images to posts
Added possibility to add images to posts
* Adding image to post is optional * Added recommenders
Added link between recommenders and post
Added link to website
Added keyword search
Added list view of post created by recommender
added search bar
Fixed search bars
Fixed security for admin only pages
Fixed security for admin only post pages
Fixed security for admin only recommender pages
Fixed security for resource pages
Posts are deletable - this also removes images and "cleans" tags - post is removed from tag if there are more post related to tag OR tag is removed if only 1 post is related to tag
Recommenders are deletable
Added recommender overview

Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/origin/UI-index' into add-recommenders
